Key Match Events: Wales led 2-0 at half-time with goals from Harry Wilson
Iceland drew level with two goals from Logi Tomasson
Wales managed to hold on for a 2-2 draw
Pre-Game Insights: Wales manager Craig Bellamy admitted he is free to pick Rangers forward Tom Lawrence
Two members of Bellamy’s squad, Adam Davies and Rhys Norrington-Davies, had been team-mates of George Baldock at Bramall Lane
Wales made four changes for the match
Bellamy reflected on his first camp in charge, emphasizing the players' exceptional performance
Ben Davies expressed excitement for the game and his role as captain
Bellamy promised not to play down expectations for the team
Post-Match Reflections: Bellamy praised his team’s resilience after coming back from 2-0 down
Davies described the experience of playing for Wales as exciting with added pressure
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in cold conditions in Reykjavik
Weather conditions did not significantly impact the game
